english: Fit the tail assembly to the fuselage .
chinese: 把装配好的机尾安装到机身上。

english: Nothing could induce him to name a motive .
chinese: 没有办法教他说出动机来。

english: He cocked his gun and laid it beside him .
chinese: 他扳上枪机，把它放在身边。

english: There was a television camera crew on board .
The guy in charge of our fleet was shocked .
chinese: 负责我们机队的人感到震惊。
机造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The lift has a cage with a platform .
chinese: 提升机有一个带平台的罐笼。

english: The refrigerator is a widely-used device .
chinese: 致冷机也是一种用途很广的装置。

english: There was the sound of a jet aircraft overhead .
chinese: 上空一架喷气机呼啸而过。

english: The neighbors borrowed my lawn mower .
chinese: 邻居们借用我的除草机。

english: The glider uncoupled from the two planes .
The prices of bw tv sets have gone down .
The camera is attached to a device .
chinese: 摄象机与一台装置相连。
精选机挑除一切有瑕疵的制品。
许多喷气机都有加力燃烧室。

english: Being old and sly, i forbore to call out .
chinese: 我上了年纪，人又机伶，所以并没声张。
